hadiths.text: It was narrated that Sahl bin Sa'd said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: 'Going out before noon or after noon, in the cause of Allah, the Mighty and Sublime, is better than this world and everything in it

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ غَدْوَةٍ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ عَزَّ وَجَلَّ .
chapter.eng-name: The Virtue Of Going Out Before Noon In The Cause Of Allah, The Mighty and Sublime
